name: Inked Out!
description:
Controls.

WASD to move. 

ARROW keys to aim.

ESC to open the pause menu.

What does each colour of ink do?

Green gives you SPEED.

Red gives you HEALTH.

Pink gives you a temporary DAMAGE bonus.

Blue gives you DEATH (including your OWN ink!)

Other details.

Is the shake too much? Is the music bad and way too loud? Do you want more particles that exist for longer? Press ESC and press OPTIONS to open the settings and adjust things!
